channel.title: Dan Friedman's Data Science Tutorials - Machine Learning

item.title: K-Means Algorithm from Scratch
item.description: Explanation of K-Means clustering algorithm, an easy-to-understand library K-Means library built from "scratch" in Python, and implementation of K-Means with a simple example
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman

item.title: Segmentation vs. Clustering
item.description: An introduction to manual segmention of data into groups versus clustering
item.dc:creator: Dan Friedman
